item.title: City’s EVM Warehouse to get new machines
item.description: City’s EVM Warehouse to get new machines A permanent solution to store election-related material Electronic Voting Machines, Control Units, Ballot Units in transit from Hyderabad Mysuru: Things are falling in place to equip the Election Commission of India’s newly-constructed Electronic Voting Machine (EVM) Warehouse that was recently inaugurated in city near the new Deputy Commissioner’s Office at Siddarthanagar.
